py.execnet: elastic distributed programming

Since pylib 1.1 "py.execnet" is separated out of hte lib and now available through the standalone execnet standalone package.

If you have usages of the "py.execnet.*" 1.0 API you can likely rename all occurences of the string py.execnet. with the string execnet..
